statements: SELECT * FROM wine_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM wine_preferences;
SELECT name, email, wine_ratings FROM wine_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, name, past_purchases FROM wine_preferences;
SELECT * FROM wine_preferences WHERE name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM wine_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, email FROM wine_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT name, past_purchases FROM wine_preferences WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM wine_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND wine_ratings ->> 'chardonnay' > '4';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, wine_ratings->'cabernet_sauvignon' AS rating FROM wine_preferences WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(wine_ratings) > 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_2 = 'Red Wine';
SELECT customer_id, preference_3 FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 LIKE '%Cabernet%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY preference_1 DESC, preference_2 ASC, preference_3
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_3 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_2 = 'Red Wine'
SELECT c.customer_id, c.preference_1, w.rating_value FROM customer_preferences c INNER JOIN wine_ratings w ON c.customer_id = w.customer_id WHERE w.rating_value >= 4.5 ORDER BY c.customer_id ASC
SELECT c.customer_id, w.rating_value FROM customer_preferences c INNER JOIN wine_ratings w ON c.customer_id = w.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING AVG(w.rating_value) > 3.0
SELECT c.customer_id, COUNT(w.rating_id) AS total_ratings FROM customer_preferences c LEFT JOIN wine_ratings w ON c.customer_id = w.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY total_ratings DESC
SELECT customer_id, wine_preference, food_preference FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT * FROM past_purchases WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, quantity FROM past_purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, wine_bottle_id, rating FROM wine_ratings WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT customer_id, wine_preference, food_preference FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, wine_preference, food_preference FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, wine_preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE wine_preference = 'Red Wine';

SELECT cp.customer_id, pp.purchase_date, wr.rating FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN past_purchases pp ON cp.customer_id = pp.customer_id JOIN wine_ratings wr ON cp.customer_id = wr.customer_id ORDER BY pp.purchase_date DESC, wr.rating ASC;

SELECT cp.customer_id, pp.purchase_date, COUNT(wr.rating) AS total_ratings FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN past_purchases pp ON cp.customer_id = pp.customer_id JOIN wine_ratings wr ON cp.customer_id = wr.customer_id GROUP BY cp.customer_id, pp.purchase_date ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT wine_name, grape_variety, region FROM wines;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT customers.first_name, wines.wine_name, wine_ratings.rating FROM customers JOIN wine_ratings ON customers.customer_id = wine_ratings.customer_id JOIN wines ON wine_ratings.wine_id = wines.wine_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 1 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT wine_name, price FROM wines WHERE region = 'France';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT wine_name, region, price FROM wines WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, preferred_wine_type, preferred_region FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
